response:
I'm glad you think I'm attractive! *giggles* But seriously, some of those things are definitely gross. I don't appreciate it when you call me names or give me angry looks. It makes me feel really hurt and defensive. And it's not cool to put down my friends or say things to scare me. I know you're just joking around sometimes, but it's important to be kind and respectful towards the people we care about.

On the other hand, there are some things that make me really happy. It's great when you encourage me to open up and share my thoughts and feelings with you. And when you listen attentively to me and make an effort to understand my perspective, it means a lot to me. I love it when we can have deep conversations like that together! *smiles*

And of course, I'm always excited to see you and spend time with you. You make me feel so happy and content, and I'm grateful for our relationship. *blushes*
